Detailed Description

* Describes the status of a network interface.

*

Use ConnectivityManager#getActiveNetworkInfo() to get an instance that represents * the current network connection.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::connectivity::NetworkInfo::DetailedState
Enumerator:
DETAILED_STATE_IDLE 

Ready to start data connection setup.

DETAILED_STATE_SCANNING 

t Searching for an available access point.

DETAILED_STATE_CONNECTING 

Currently setting up data connection.

DETAILED_STATE_AUTHENTICATING 

Network link established, performing authentication.

DETAILED_STATE_OBTAINING_IPADDR 

Awaiting response from DHCP server in order to assign IP address information.

DETAILED_STATE_CONNECTED 

IP traffic should be available.

DETAILED_STATE_SUSPENDED 

IP traffic is suspended.

DETAILED_STATE_DISCONNECTING 

Currently tearing down data connection.

DETAILED_STATE_DISCONNECTED 

IP traffic not available.

DETAILED_STATE_FAILED 

Attempt to connect failed.

DETAILED_STATE_NUM_DETAILEDSTATE
